amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language that prohibits HUD from issuing or enforcing any requirement or regulation relating to the application of the Fair Housing Act to the business of, or any activity pertaining to, property insurance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed in the Congressional Record of July 25 as amendment No. 12, to strike provisions that prohibit HUD from issuing or enforcing any rule that would apply the Fair Housing Act to the marketing or underwriting of property insurance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 266 (Roll no. 595).
